subtitle: hi this is Simon Jacobsen and welcome to
meaningful Monday's where we answer your
personal questions the question this
week is about Kabbalah I've been going
to many cup all the classes lately they
teach that if you transform your inner
self to become a giver
then you will ultimately receive
everything you want out of life is this
your understanding of what Kabbalah is
doesn't God sometimes want something
different from us
than what we may want and is it really
all about what we want whenever I hear
any type of institution focusing too
much on becoming givers you become
skeptical whether it is another ploy a
fundraising ploy but giving them the
benefit of the doubt let me say this
Kabbalah the word Kabbalah means to
receive in order to be able to receive
you have to empty yourself of your ego
and your interests so though a byproduct
of that is becoming the best you can be
but the number one condition is to
become a recipient to become a channel
and that opens up many channels or
blessings unfortunately in our self-help
society often the focus is what's in it
for me and that itself undermines the
real ability to discover your own inner
soul resources when in truth the way the
Kabbalah teaches is that emptier you are
of yourself the more you become a
conduit to channel for blessings from
above the ultimate goal is really to be
a servant and serve something greater
than yourself that's what brings real
blessings in one's life and that's the
answer
essence of Kabbalah which means to
receive to receive from your teacher to
receive from God and to be in a
receptive mode but you're able to absorb
be sensitive to the sounds to the voices
to the concerns of others this has been
meaningful Mondays
if you'd like to submit your own
personal question please
on the link below everyone have very
meaningful
you
